name: Rainmaker: Cryptocurrency & Stock Fantasy Gaming
description:
Rainmaker is a one of its kind immersive fantasy gaming app, focused on bringing together new  and experienced cryptocurrency and stock market enthusiasts for a rewarding and gamified fantasy experience.

 Ever considered learning about or diving into the cryptocurrency & stock market? Rainmaker, help’s you understand and start building your cryptocurrency and stock portfolio strategies in no time, choose between our free practice contests or paid contests for exciting rewards. In-game skilled accomplishments are awarded while you learn how to strategically analyze cryptocurrency and  stock. With Rainmaker, the cryptocurrency and stock market game app, we aim to make Investment, accessible and interesting.

 Grow your analysis skills and learn by building multiple strategies in a wide variety of gripping and exciting contests to suit every fantasy gamer’s comfort and skill. It doesn’t matter if you are  experienced or someone new to cryptocurrency and stock market, Rainmaker helps you understand, evaluate and practice best analysis practices to offer you an immersive gaming experience that is also educational. Rainmaker is the best cryptocurrency and stock market game app for a hands-on fun experience with stock fantasy games & cryptocurrency gaming.

Rainmaker Top Features

  • Quick Signup
  • User-Friendly Interface
  • An extensive list of Stocks & Cryptocurrencies
  • Play with Real People
  • Free/Paid Contests
  • Flexible Entry Fee
  • Exit Option
  • Unique Point System

Signing up on Rainmaker is super simple! Rainmaker is a stock market & cryptocurrency gaming app that you can download on your phone and log in with 2 simple steps using your mobile number.

 Rainmaker has an amazing user-friendly interface that makes the app easy to use. This provides a meaningful and valuable user experience that will change how we see Fantasy Gaming.

Select from an extensive list of stocks and cryptocurrencies to build an unbeatable portfolio. Build multiple portfolios to participate in various contests. Never miss out on an opportunity ever again!

The best part of using the Rainmaker app is that you interact and compete with real people, challenge your trading instincts and see where you stand in the real world. Be a part of our thriving Cryptocurrency and stock fantasy gaming community!

Dive into a time-bound competition with peer analysis wizards. Choose between free or paid contests. Free contests are meant for you to practice, warm-up, understand and prepare for paid competitions or simply testing out different strategies. When you feel you are ready for a challenge, easily switch to paid contests and start winning phenomenal rewards from stock & cryptocurrency gaming.

 Choose between the paid or free contests and win attractive monetary rewards. The app allows you to explore multiple contests & entry fees that suit your appetite. You can enter with an amount as low as Rs. 20.

 Exit feature takes the control out of the game and right into your hands. You can exit from your selection either from an individual Crypto or stock, or from the entire portfolio during an ongoing contest as and when you feel it's the right time to do so. Either to accumulate and lock maximum points or to restrict negative performance of your selection, the Exit feature will be your Rainmaker, at any point of time during the contest. No questions asked.

 An added point for every gain and a point reduced for every loss. Rainmaker uses a simple and  unique point system to calculate the overall portfolio performance in the contest. This ensures that the users have a clear picture of points calculations and rankings at the end of each contest. Talk about transparency!

RainMaker is the best app for the stock market and cryptocurrency gaming to sharpen your Cryptocurrency and Stock analysis skills and techniques, helping you succeed in your journey to investing smart. We believe our stock gaming app will help users learn about investment, build strategies and perform skilled analysis, making them ready to understand the real world of Investment strategy building, so that users make more informed real world decisions.

 Download the Rainmaker app for free and get the best out of a leading stock market & cryptocurrency gaming platform! Be your own Rainmaker, and make it rain.
